text: Use the Prometheus forwarding agent to publish metrics to a Prometheus scrape endpoint. In this way you can send any data that is processed in a workflow as metrics. This section has the following subsections: Prometheus Forwarding Agent Configuration Prometheus Forwarding Agent Events Prometheus Forwarding Agent Input/Output Data and MIM Prometheus Forwarding Agent Example
title: Prometheus Forwarding Agent - MediationZone Documentation 9.4 - InfoZone
